S.FORM: u Hungary sa i labu nu Europe, itiza i 47 00 N, 20 00 E u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 93,028 km2 u ahebal nu lalaay sa 89,608 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 3,420 km2 hamin nu tademaw sa 9,874,784. kakalukan umah sa 58.90%, kilakilangan umah sa 22.50%, zumaay henay umah sa 18.60% caay kamu cabaya a kanatla nu Taywan. tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Budapest . kakininan nu kanatal demiad kakining nu kanatal demiad sa 20 bulad 8 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci János Áder, micakat a demiad sa i 2012 a mihca 5 bulad 10 demiad. cunli u cunli nu Hungary ayza sa ci Viktor Orbán, micakat a demiad sa i 2010 a mihcaan 5 bulad 29 demiad. Hungary Hungary Hungary a kamu "Magyarorsza'g" han u i Cung-ow Pannonia masaenal ku lalabu nu kanatal, 93030 kungli kaahebal, nuwaminsa a belaw u Slovakia, nuwalia amis a belaw u Ukraine, nuwalian atu nuwalian timul balaw u Romania, nutimulan a belaw u Serbia, satipan timul belaw Croatia, satipan belaw Slovenia, satipan nuwamisan a belaw u Austria. kanatal a kamu Magyarok han, nu Ouzhou ku kamu. caay ku nu Yindu Ouzhou a kamu. u Oumeng tatudungay a ahebal nu kanatal. kahenunal a tu-se atu satabakiay a tu-se u Budapest, nu zumaay a tabakiay tu-se zuma satu u Debrecen, Szeged, Miskolc, Bei-chi, Jiaoer. ayzaay a Hungary a kanatal i ayaw tu malebut a mihcaan namakuwan nu pinaay a binacadan, pasu Dacia a tademaw, Celtic (Kai-er-te a tademaw 凱爾特人), Roman (Romae 羅馬) a tademaw, Germanic (Rierman a tademaw 日耳曼人), Hungary a tademaw , nutipan a slavs a tademaw , atu Avaria a tademawan . kasumamadan tu 9 a mihcaan , Magyar a tademaw ci Alpad (Aer-pa-de 阿爾帕德) a tapang ku mikeliday mademec ku Karpat-medence, u baki a wawaan niza ci Isn-te'-wan cacay a lasubua a mihcaan i cacay a malebut a mihcaan malahungti, patizeng satu tu ciwlu a kiwkay. kasumamadan tu 12 a mihcaan, Hungary mala Ouzhou a kakitizaan u saicelangay a misakakuay. kasumamadan tu15 a mihcaan, u lalangawan atu cen-ce katukuh tu i satalakaway. 1526 a mihcaan u saayaway nu Mohachi (Mo-ha-chi 摩哈赤) a ngangayaw hawsa Hungary makelec nu Ottoman (E-tu-man 鄂圖曼) "1541-1699 a mihcaan". kasumamadan tu18 a mihcaan malingatu makuwan nu Habsburg Monarchy. 19 a mihcaan atu Austria masakapu tu Austria Hungary a kanatal, mala u saicelangay mikuwan nu Europe. saayaway a ngangayaw nu kitakit hawsa, Austro-Hungarian (Ao-Hungary 奧匈) a kanatal maliwasak tu, namasasulit tu Trianon (Te-li-ya-nung 特里亞農) a katatelekan hawsa Hungary malasawad tu ku payhun 71% a lala' atu payhun 58% ku tademaw, atu payhun 32% ku tademaw nu Mazar. zikuzan tu kalawlawan a mihcaan, Hungary micumud tu nitungusay i balucu'ay u kanatal milihiza tu sakatusa a ngangayaw nu kitakit, satu pihaceng ku madukaay mapatayay. zikuzan nu sakatusa a ngangayaw, Hungary mala nu Sulian a uysin a kanatal katukuh i 1989 a mihcaan. i 1956 a mihcaan u Hungary mikawaw tu misapakutay caay kalaheci hawsa, Hungary pasumad tu Goulash (Ku-las-sen 古拉什) kung-can a nizatengan. 1989 a mihcaan atu Austria masasu patahkal tu lilis nu kanatal kalamkam satu maliwasak ku nuwalianay a sakaput atu Sulian. 1989 amihcaan caca a bataan tusa bataan izaw ku tulu a demiad, Hungaty amala u I'-huy-min-cu a kanatal. . saayaway a ngangayaw nu kitakit hawsa, Austro-Hungarian (Ao-Hungary 奧匈) a kanatal maliwasak tu, namasasulit tu Trianon (Te-li-ya-nung 特里亞農) a katatelekan hawsa Hungary malasawad tu ku payhun 71% a lala' atu payhun 58% ku tademaw, atu payhun32% ku tademaw nu Mazar. zikuzan tu kalawlawan a mihcaan, Hungary micumud tu nisakapu milihiza tu sakatusa nu kitakit a ngangangan, satu pihaceng ku madukaay mapatayay. zikuzan nu sakatusa a ngangayaw, Hungary mala nu Sulian a uysin a kanatal katukuh i 1989 a mihcaan. i 1956 a mihcaan u Hungary ke-min mademec hawsa, Hungary pasumad tu nu Ku-las-sen kung-can a nisabalucu'an. 1989 a mihcaan atu Austria masasu patahkal tu lilis nu kanatal kalamkam satu maliwasak ku nuwalianay a sakaput atu Sulian. 1989 amihcaan cacay a bulad tusa bataan izaw ku tulu a demiad, Hungaty amala u tatenglan nu binawlan a kanatal. laylay歷史 895年之前ayaw nu 895 a mihcaan ayaw nu kasumamadan tu 9 a mihcaan, Luoma a tademal mapenec tu ku tizaay a Yin-cu-min ci Dacia a tademaw patizeng satu tu Pannonia a kenis. 395 a mihcaan, Luoma diguo mangeli' hawsa, paybinacadan lalid satu mabulaw tayni. kasumamadan tu 5 a mihcaan tu teban, Hungary a tademaw i A-ti-la i "434-453" a mihcaan, ku nikelid patizeng tuway tu Hungary Hungti a kanatal. 453 a mihcaan mapatay tu ci A-ti-la hawsa, malawpes tu ku Hungary. katuud ku nu Rierman a niyazu' mahiniay u Gepids a tademaw, Gede a tademaw ,Wang daer a tademaw, Lunba-di a tademaw kakilukilu sa mikuwan tu itiniay pakala tu cacay a lasubu a mihcaan. Hungary a tademaw ci Gepidae a tademaw ayaw itini patizang tu Gepidae a Hungti a kanatal, zikuzan satu kasaniyazu' nu Slav a niyazu' malingatu tu micumud mueneng itini. 560 a mihcaan Avar a tademaw patizeng tu Avar-han a kanatal atu itini a kakitizaan mikawaw mialaw mikuwan katukuh i 200 a mihcaan katenens. 790 a mihcaan, Avar-han a kanatal malawpes nu Frankish- Kinngdom atu Chali-dadi, kasumamadan tu 9 a mihcaan, cay ku tungusay nu Frank a tademawan tu ci Silaf a tademaw i Duo-nao-xian-an patizeng tu Palaton a kanatal, i Baojialiya u saayaway a Hungti a kanatal maala tu nu Duonaohea a nuwalian a tukus mikuwan tu itizaaytu a Silaf a niyazu' atu liwanliwan tu nu Avar a tademaw.中世紀 teban nu kasumamadan a mihcaan(895年至1526年) Hungary a kanatal mala u lalekal nu kasumamadan tu 9 a mihcaan hawsa, sawaliayan u pahabayay tu aadupan a binacadan Magyar a tademaw namakay Ula-san-silu atu Voga-River a sauwacan, nu yazaay a Basgort-tele, pasayza i satipan mabulaw, i 896 a mihcaan i Donau a masahelungay a kakitizaan mueneng. katayni nu Magyar a tademaw pahezek tu ku nikacaculi nu itiniay a kakitizaan. laylay nu babalaki, Magyar a tademaw kanatal asaan nau Aer-pa-de a kanatal ku patizegay a saan, ciniza i kasumamadan tu 9 a mihcaan tu sazikuzay a mihcaan mikelad tu Magyar a tademawan tayza i enal nu Pannonia.1000年, 1000 a mihcaan Hungary a Hungti ci Istvan Urbanyi cacay a lasubu a mihcaan i Hungary palekal tu kelistukiw mala ku-cyaw, satu pakala tu nu kiwkay a nipacakat mala u saayaway a Hungti nu Hungary , patizeng satu Hungary a Hungti a kanatal. kasumamadan u laylay malecad tu Bolan atu Bohemian makakayat tu, namahiza namapalilid nu ciwlu atu u kasenengan a Roman Empire a Hungti. 1241 a mihcaan katukuh i 1242 a mihcaan, ci Ba-du satipan micumud mingawaw, Hungary namapihaceng ku nikapeci'. satu Hungary haymaw satu macakat mala nu Europe u saicelangay misatekeday hungti a kanatal. izaw ku salungayay masacidekay a lalangawan, mahiza u nu Xiou nuzuma a macakata a nikauzip macacayat tu. Hunyadi Matyas i 1458 a mihcaan katukuh 1490 a mihcaan mikuwan tu Hungar talaayaw satu ciniza pasaicelang tu Hungary atu cin-bu a icelang. i pikuwan niza hawsa, Hungary " uyzaan saca u nuwamisanay, ayzaay a Slovakia nu zumaay a kakitizaan" mala u palekalan tu lalangawan nalimaan a mihcaan, Ouzhou a kasaupuan kapulungay tu nalimaan lalangawan. cin-經濟 uyniay a kanatal caay kadadah ku nu tahakay a laculan, u tapang u ku'ng-can u Lu-tu, pisuped a kayadah sakatul i Europe. mamin i kanatal 2/3 a kakitizaan izaw ku akutiay a lalaculan. u kalukan ku tapang a kahenulan. tapang nipalumaan izaw ku habay, kubkub, malinsu, atu sicedamay a lami'. u kung-ye u kikay ku misangaay, nu keciay a kikay, misabaluhay tu kakanan atu mitenunay ku tapang, misaepah tu badisusu' kya singangan.namakay 2004 a mihcaan lima a bulad cacay a demiad mala baluhay a tademaw nu Oumenng, Hungary a cin-ci lalid sa icelang macakat. imahini izaw ku nu uzipay a kusi patahkal paanina uynian a kanatal payhun 80% katalakaw tu GDP. 2007 a mihcaan hawsa, mahamin ku kitakitay malilid tu kapelpel nu cin-ci, Hungary kalamkam satu malawacu ku cinci. ducduc tu pulung nisulitan, Hungary i kitakit u sapihacengay kalihanawan a cinci nu kanatal. maydih a malaheci' tahkal i 2020 a mihcaan sibalucu' micumud tu Ouzhou a kalisiwan, uynian a kanatal maydih a talaayaw ku cin-ci pasumad.

o Hongary sa i labo no Eorope, itiza i 47 00 N, 20 00 E o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa 93,028 km2 o ahebal no lalaay sa 89,608 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa 3,420 km2 hamin no tademaw sa 9,874,784. kakalokan omah sa 58.90%, kilakilangan omah sa 22.50%, zomaay henay omah sa 18.60% caay kamo cabaya a kanatla no Taywan. tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Bodapest . kakininan no kanatal demiad kakining no kanatal demiad sa 20 bolad 8 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci János Áder, micakat a demiad sa i 2012 a mihca 5 bolad 10 demiad. conli o conli no Hongary ayza sa ci Viktor Orbán, micakat a demiad sa i 2010 a mihcaan 5 bolad 29 demiad. Hongary Hongary Hongary a kamo "Magyarorsza'g" han o i Cong-ow Pannonia masaenal ko lalabo no kanatal, 93030 kongli kaahebal, nowaminsa a belaw o Slovakia, nowalia amis a belaw o Ukraine, nowalian ato nowalian timol balaw o Romania, notimolan a belaw o Serbia, satipan timol belaw Croatia, satipan belaw Slovenia, satipan nowamisan a belaw o Aostria. kanatal a kamo Magyarok han, no Oozhoo ko kamo. caay ko no Yindo Oozhoo a kamo. o Oomeng tatodongay a ahebal no kanatal. kahenonal a to-se ato satabakiay a to-se o Bodapest, no zomaay a tabakiay to-se zoma sato o Debrecen, Szeged, Miskolc, Bei-chi, Jiaoer. ayzaay a Hongary a kanatal i ayaw to malebot a mihcaan namakowan no pinaay a binacadan, paso Dacia a tademaw, Celtic (Kai-er-te a tademaw 凱爾特人), Roman (Romae 羅馬) a tademaw, Germanic (Rierman a tademaw 日耳曼人), Hongary a tademaw , notipan a slavs a tademaw , ato Avaria a tademawan . kasomamadan to 9 a mihcaan , Magyar a tademaw ci Alpad (Aer-pa-de 阿爾帕德) a tapang ko mikeliday mademec ko Karpat-medence, o baki a wawaan niza ci Isn-te'-wan cacay a lasoboa a mihcaan i cacay a malebot a mihcaan malahongti, patizeng sato to ciwlo a kiwkay. kasomamadan to 12 a mihcaan, Hongary mala Oozhoo a kakitizaan o saicelangay a misakakoay. kasomamadan to15 a mihcaan, o lalangawan ato cen-ce katokoh to i satalakaway. 1526 a mihcaan o saayaway no Mohachi (Mo-ha-chi 摩哈赤) a ngangayaw hawsa Hongary makelec no Ottoman (E-to-man 鄂圖曼) "1541-1699 a mihcaan". kasomamadan to18 a mihcaan malingato makowan no Habsborg Monarchy. 19 a mihcaan ato Aostria masakapo to Aostria Hongary a kanatal, mala o saicelangay mikowan no Eorope. saayaway a ngangayaw no kitakit hawsa, Aostro-Hongarian (Ao-Hongary 奧匈) a kanatal maliwasak to, namasasolit to Trianon (Te-li-ya-nong 特里亞農) a katatelekan hawsa Hongary malasawad to ko payhon 71% a lala' ato payhon 58% ko tademaw, ato payhon 32% ko tademaw no Mazar. zikozan to kalawlawan a mihcaan, Hongary micomod to nitongosay i baloco'ay o kanatal milihiza to sakatosa a ngangayaw no kitakit, sato pihaceng ko madokaay mapatayay. zikozan no sakatosa a ngangayaw, Hongary mala no Solian a oysin a kanatal katokoh i 1989 a mihcaan. i 1956 a mihcaan o Hongary mikawaw to misapakotay caay kalaheci hawsa, Hongary pasomad to Goolash (Ko-las-sen 古拉什) kong-can a nizatengan. 1989 a mihcaan ato Aostria masaso patahkal to lilis no kanatal kalamkam sato maliwasak ko nowalianay a sakapot ato Solian. 1989 amihcaan caca a bataan tosa bataan izaw ko tolo a demiad, Hongaty amala o I'-hoy-min-co a kanatal. . saayaway a ngangayaw no kitakit hawsa, Aostro-Hongarian (Ao-Hongary 奧匈) a kanatal maliwasak to, namasasolit to Trianon (Te-li-ya-nong 特里亞農) a katatelekan hawsa Hongary malasawad to ko payhon 71% a lala' ato payhon 58% ko tademaw, ato payhon32% ko tademaw no Mazar. zikozan to kalawlawan a mihcaan, Hongary micomod to nisakapo milihiza to sakatosa no kitakit a ngangangan, sato pihaceng ko madokaay mapatayay. zikozan no sakatosa a ngangayaw, Hongary mala no Solian a oysin a kanatal katokoh i 1989 a mihcaan. i 1956 a mihcaan o Hongary ke-min mademec hawsa, Hongary pasomad to no Ko-las-sen kong-can a nisabaloco'an. 1989 a mihcaan ato Aostria masaso patahkal to lilis no kanatal kalamkam sato maliwasak ko nowalianay a sakapot ato Solian. 1989 amihcaan cacay a bolad tosa bataan izaw ko tolo a demiad, Hongaty amala o tatenglan no binawlan a kanatal. laylay歷史 895年之前ayaw no 895 a mihcaan ayaw no kasomamadan to 9 a mihcaan, Looma a tademal mapenec to ko tizaay a Yin-co-min ci Dacia a tademaw patizeng sato to Pannonia a kenis. 395 a mihcaan, Looma digoo mangeli' hawsa, paybinacadan lalid sato mabolaw tayni. kasomamadan to 5 a mihcaan to teban, Hongary a tademaw i A-ti-la i "434-453" a mihcaan, ko nikelid patizeng toway to Hongary Hongti a kanatal. 453 a mihcaan mapatay to ci A-ti-la hawsa, malawpes to ko Hongary. katood ko no Rierman a niyazo' mahiniay o Gepids a tademaw, Gede a tademaw ,Wang daer a tademaw, Lonba-di a tademaw kakilokilo sa mikowan to itiniay pakala to cacay a lasobo a mihcaan. Hongary a tademaw ci Gepidae a tademaw ayaw itini patizang to Gepidae a Hongti a kanatal, zikozan sato kasaniyazo' no Slav a niyazo' malingato to micomod moeneng itini. 560 a mihcaan Avar a tademaw patizeng to Avar-han a kanatal ato itini a kakitizaan mikawaw mialaw mikowan katokoh i 200 a mihcaan katenens. 790 a mihcaan, Avar-han a kanatal malawpes no Frankish- Kinngdom ato Chali-dadi, kasomamadan to 9 a mihcaan, cay ko tongosay no Frank a tademawan to ci Silaf a tademaw i Doo-nao-xian-an patizeng to Palaton a kanatal, i Baojialiya o saayaway a Hongti a kanatal maala to no Doonaohea a nowalian a tokos mikowan to itizaayto a Silaf a niyazo' ato liwanliwan to no Avar a tademaw.中世紀 teban no kasomamadan a mihcaan(895年至1526年) Hongary a kanatal mala o lalekal no kasomamadan to 9 a mihcaan hawsa, sawaliayan o pahabayay to aadopan a binacadan Magyar a tademaw namakay Ula-san-silo ato Voga-River a saowacan, no yazaay a Basgort-tele, pasayza i satipan mabolaw, i 896 a mihcaan i Donao a masahelongay a kakitizaan moeneng. katayni no Magyar a tademaw pahezek to ko nikacacoli no itiniay a kakitizaan. laylay no babalaki, Magyar a tademaw kanatal asaan nao Aer-pa-de a kanatal ko patizegay a saan, ciniza i kasomamadan to 9 a mihcaan to sazikozay a mihcaan mikelad to Magyar a tademawan tayza i enal no Pannonia.1000年, 1000 a mihcaan Hongary a Hongti ci Istvan Urbanyi cacay a lasobo a mihcaan i Hongary palekal to kelistokiw mala ko-cyaw, sato pakala to no kiwkay a nipacakat mala o saayaway a Hongti no Hongary , patizeng sato Hongary a Hongti a kanatal. kasomamadan o laylay malecad to Bolan ato Bohemian makakayat to, namahiza namapalilid no ciwlo ato o kasenengan a Roman Empire a Hongti. 1241 a mihcaan katokoh i 1242 a mihcaan, ci Ba-do satipan micomod mingawaw, Hongary namapihaceng ko nikapeci'. sato Hongary haymaw sato macakat mala no Eorope o saicelangay misatekeday hongti a kanatal. izaw ko salongayay masacidekay a lalangawan, mahiza o no Xioo nozoma a macakata a nikaozip macacayat to. Honyadi Matyas i 1458 a mihcaan katokoh 1490 a mihcaan mikowan to Hongar talaayaw sato ciniza pasaicelang to Hongary ato cin-bo a icelang. i pikowan niza hawsa, Hongary " oyzaan saca o nowamisanay, ayzaay a Slovakia no zomaay a kakitizaan" mala o palekalan to lalangawan nalimaan a mihcaan, Oozhoo a kasaopoan kapolongay to nalimaan lalangawan. cin-經濟 oyniay a kanatal caay kadadah ko no tahakay a lacolan, o tapang o ko'ng-can o Lo-to, pisoped a kayadah sakatol i Eorope. mamin i kanatal 2/3 a kakitizaan izaw ko akotiay a lalacolan. o kalokan ko tapang a kahenolan. tapang nipalomaan izaw ko habay, kobkob, malinso, ato sicedamay a lami'. o kong-ye o kikay ko misangaay, no keciay a kikay, misabalohay to kakanan ato mitenonay ko tapang, misaepah to badisoso' kya singangan.namakay 2004 a mihcaan lima a bolad cacay a demiad mala balohay a tademaw no Oomenng, Hongary a cin-ci lalid sa icelang macakat. imahini izaw ko no ozipay a kosi patahkal paanina oynian a kanatal payhon 80% katalakaw to GDP. 2007 a mihcaan hawsa, mahamin ko kitakitay malilid to kapelpel no cin-ci, Hongary kalamkam sato malawaco ko cinci. docdoc to polong nisolitan, Hongary i kitakit o sapihacengay kalihanawan a cinci no kanatal. maydih a malaheci' tahkal i 2020 a mihcaan sibaloco' micomod to Oozhoo a kalisiwan, oynian a kanatal maydih a talaayaw ko cin-ci pasomad.
